00019 #ifndef _FIR_HPP_cm110527_
00020 #define _FIR_HPP_cm110527_
00021 
00022 #include <algorithm>
00023 #include <vector>
00024 #include <complex>
00025 #include <stdexcept>
00026 #include "FFT.hpp"
00027 
00028 namespace filter {
00029   namespace fir {    
00030     namespace detail {
00031       template<typename T>
00032       class FFTWindowDesign {
00033       public:
00034         typedef T float_type;
00035         typedef typename std::complex<float_type> complex_type;
00036         typedef typename std::vector<float_type> real_vector_type;
00037         typedef typename std::vector<complex_type> complex_vector_type;
00038         
00039         FFTWindowDesign(size_t n)
00040           : b_(n,0) {
00041           if ((n % 2) == 0) throw std::runtime_error("FFTWindowDesign::FFTWindowDesign n is even");
00042         }
00043         virtual ~FFTWindowDesign() {}
00044         
00045         const real_vector_type& coeff() const { return b_; }    
00046         
00047       protected:
00048         template<typename win_function_type>
00049         void design_(const complex_vector_type& f_pos,        // 0 and positive frequencies
00050                      const complex_vector_type& f_neg,        // 0 and negative frequencies
00051                      const win_function_type& win_function) { // window function
00052           if (f_pos.size() != f_neg.size())
00053             throw std::runtime_error("f_pos.size() != f_neg.size()");
00054           
00055           // arrange positive and negative frequencies
00056           complex_vector_type f(f_pos);
00057           std::reverse_copy(f_neg.begin()+1, f_neg.end()-1, std::back_inserter(f));
00058           const size_t m(f.size());
00059           
00060           //inverse FFT
00061           FFT::FFTWTransform<float_type> ifft(m, -1, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00062           ifft.transformRange(f.begin(), f.end(), FFT::WindowFunction::Rectangular<float_type>(f.size()));
00063           
00064           // multiply with window function
00065           const size_t n(b_.size());
00066           float_t sum(0);
00067           float_t max_value(0);
00068           for (size_t i(0); i<n; ++i) {
00069             b_[i] = ifft.out((m+ i - n/2) % m).real() * win_function(i);
00070             sum += b_[i];
00071             max_value = (b_[i] > max_value) ? b_[i] : max_value;
00072           }
00073           
00074           // normalize
00075           const float_t norm(float_type(1)/sum);
00076           for (size_t i(0); i<n; ++i)
00077             b_[i] *= norm;
00078         }
00079       private:
00080         real_vector_type b_;
00081       } ;  
00082     } // namespace detail
00083 
00084     template<typename T>
00085     class lowpass : public detail::FFTWindowDesign<T> {
00086     public:
00087       typedef detail::FFTWindowDesign<T> base_type;
00088       typedef typename base_type::float_type float_type;
00089       typedef typename base_type::complex_type complex_type;
00090       typedef typename base_type::real_vector_type real_vector_type;
00091       typedef typename base_type::complex_vector_type complex_vector_type;
00092       
00093       using base_type::coeff;
00094       using base_type::design_;
00095       
00096       lowpass(size_t n) 
00097         : base_type(n) {
00098       }
00099       
00100       // f0 is normalized frequency (f0=f/fs)
00101       virtual void design(double f0, double f_ramp=0.) {
00102         if (f0     < 0.) throw std::runtime_error("lowpass::design f0 < 0");
00103         if (f_ramp < 0.) throw std::runtime_error("lowpass::design f_ramp < 0");
00104         const size_t n(coeff().size());
00105         const size_t m(compute_m(n));
00106         complex_vector_type v(m);
00107         const size_t if0(size_t(std::floor(f0*m)));
00108         for (size_t i(0); i<m; ++i)
00109           v[i] = (i<=if0);
00110         const size_t k(size_t(f_ramp*m));
00111 //         std::cerr << "k= " << k << std::endl;
00112         for (size_t i(0); i<k; ++i) {
00113           const int j(int(if0+k/2)-int(i));
00114           if (j<0 || j>int(m)) continue;
00115           v[j] = double(i)/k;
00116         }
00117         
00118         base_type::design_(v, v, FFT::WindowFunction::Hamming<float_type>(v.size()));
00119       }
00120       
00121     protected:
00122     private:
00123       static size_t compute_m(size_t n) {
00124         size_t m(0);
00125         for (m=2; 2*m < n+1; m*=2) ;
00126         return m+1;
00127       }
00128       // real_vector_type b_;
00129     } ;  
00130   } // namespace fir
00131 } // namespace filter
00132
